name: The last Plane
description:
This game was made for Weekly Game Jam - Week - 149 and the theme was "Last One Left"

NOTE: You can pause game in Full Screen mode by pressing "P". You have found the last plane to escape this deadly place. But it is low on fuel. Your task is to gas the plane up and escape the planet. But no one is happy with your plans... Game was inspired by Hotline Miami video games. I tried to make a Hotline type game under a week.

Try and play the game.

Thank you;)
